img.alt: Galt Joint Union High School District Makes the Honor Roll!!! Thumbnail Image

h1.a: Galt Joint Union High School District Makes the Honor Roll!!!

div.div: Galt Joint UHSD has been named to the College Board's 10th Annual AP District Honor Roll. The Honor Roll recognizes 250 school districts in the U.S. and Canada that have increased access to AP coursework while maintaining or increasing the percentage of students earning scores of 3 or higher on AP Exams. ...Read More
